trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o formato de ficheiro da imagem.

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: Não herdável.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ImageFormat class indicate image formats such as bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), enhanced metafile (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), and icon (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe ImageFormat indicam formatos de imagem, tais como o mapa de bits (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), avançada Metaficheiro (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>) e o ícone (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the properties of the ImageFormat class to specify an image format when saving an image using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode utilizar as propriedades da classe ImageFormat para especificar um formato de imagem quando guardar uma imagem utilizando o <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can compare two image formats by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode comparar dois formatos de imagem utilizando o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Guid> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.Guid>estrutura.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Typically you use the static properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify a particular format such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A>or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, rather than constructing a new <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utiliza as propriedades estáticas do <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>classe para especificar um formato específico, tal como <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A>ou <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, em vez de construir um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> structure that specifies a particular image format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>estrutura que especifica um formato de imagem específica.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap (BMP) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de mapa de bits (BMP).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the bitmap image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem de mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets the enhanced metafile (EMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem Metaficheiro avançado (EMF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the enhanced metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem Metaficheiro avançado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is an <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that is equivalent to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o objeto especificado é um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que é equivalente a este <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de teste.

trans-unit.source: if o is an object that is equivalent to this object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o é um objeto que é equivalente a este objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the Exchangeable Image File (Exif) format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de ficheiro de imagem Exchangeable (Exif).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Exif format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de Exif.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor de código hash representa este objeto.

trans-unit.source: A hash code that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash que representa este objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de formato de intercâmbio de gráficos (GIF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the GIF image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem GIF.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Guid>estrutura que representa esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>estrutura que representa esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de ícone do Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem de ícone do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem conjunta formato JPEG especialistas grupo (JPEG).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the JPEG image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem JPEG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de um mapa de bits na memória.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de um mapa de bits na memória.

trans-unit.source: Gets the W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de W3C portátil rede gráficos (PNG).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the PNG image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem PNG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de formato de ficheiro de imagem (TIFF) etiquetados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the TIFF image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem TIFF.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto numa cadeia legível por humanos.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows metafile (WMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem Metaficheiro (WMF) do Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Windows metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> objeto que indica o formato de imagem Metaficheiro do Windows.
